subject: AMST
name: H:PopArt&PublicLife 1900-40
fullname: Honors: American Popular Arts and Public Life, 1900-1940
info: Interdisciplinary study of American society from precontact to industrialization. American literature, art, music, and popular culture in historical context.

subject: AMST
name: Honors: American Novel 1900
info: Novels from early 1900s realism through Modernists (e.g., Faulkner, Hemingway, Fitzgerald) to recent writers (e.g., Ellison, Bellow, Erdrich, Pynchon). Stylistic experiments, emergence of voices from under-represented groups. Novelists' responses to a technologically changing society.
